description: Boots carved with protective runes in the old dwarven manner. Each rune provides specific protectionâ€”against fire, against poison, against evil. Master runecrafters spend years on a single pair of such boots. The runes glow faintly when their protection activates, warding off harm.
magicEffect: +1 to all saves, +1 AC, +1 spell save DC
name: Runecarved Boots
